comment: Don't followback. It makes no sense. Most accounts produce very little original content. You end up seeing the same reposts ten times.
amr:
# ::snt Don't followback. It makes no sense. Most accounts produce very little original content. You end up seeing the same reposts ten times.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (f / follow-02
            :polarity -
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :direction (b / back))
      :snt2 (s / sense-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (ii / it))
      :snt3 (p / produce-01
            :ARG0 (a / account
                  :mod (m2 / most))
            :ARG1 (c / content
                  :mod (o / original)
                  :mod (l / little
                        :degree (v / very))))
      :snt4 (e / end-up-03
            :ARG1 (y2 / you)
            :ARG2 (s2 / see-01
                  :frequency 10
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG1-of (r / repost-01)
                        :ARG1-of (s3 / same-01)))))
